channel.title: gzip on Thuc notes
channel.description: Recent content in gzip on Thuc notes

item.title: Deflate algorithm
item.description: Deflate is a lossless streaming compression/decompression algorithm. It’s used widely in GZIP and PNG. Deflate is a combination of LZ77 and Huffman coding algorithm to compress data.

item.title: Huffman coding algorithm
item.description: The Huffman coding is an algorithm that is used for lossless data compression, such as gzip or PNG image format.
